title: minerjones
author: minerjones
created_time: June 16, 2022, 01:27:19 AMLast edit: June 16, 2022, 07:11:58 PM by minerjones
content: A few 2016 Lealana 5 XMR (Monero) coins up for auctionLOT 1: 2016 Lealana 5 XMR brass coins x4: #305, #315, #323, #352LOT 2: 2016 Lealana 5 XMR brass coins redeemed x2: #403, #478**winners will be able to select coin numbers based on order of win****digital certs will be provided to winners after auction**BOTH LOTS will run on a LIFO system where you will bid on the number of coins and then the amount per coin.Click here for exampleSTARTING BID PER COIN PER LOT 1: 5.00 XMRSTARTING BID PER COIN PER LOT 2: 0.10 XMRMINIMUM BID INCREMENT PER COIN PER LOT: 0.02 XMR**Please limit bids to ONLY 2 decimal places**END TIME: JUNE 20th, 2022, 14:00:00 PDT**Payment due within 24 hours of auction end!!**SNIPE: Any bid made in last 5 minutes PER LOT will extend the auction 5 minutes beyond the ending time PER LOTIf within those 5 extended minutes, a new bid is made PER LOT, 5 minutes will be added to the that lot from the time of that bid.PAYMENT: XMR preferred, Bitcoin BTC also accepted. A signed PGP message will be sent to winner with payment addressSHIPPING: Based on location and preference

comments.author: Cryptogreatdane
comments.body: Question.. so if all four coins have a bid of 5 monero and i outbid on one coin. How do you determine who gets bumped out. Since specific coin numbers are not picked.

comments.author: Ballhog69
comments.body: Quote from: Cryptogreatdane on June 20, 2022, 02:53:27 AMQuestion.. so if all four coins have a bid of 5 monero and i outbid on one coin. How do you determine who gets bumped out. Since specific coin numbers are not picked. LIFO = last in first out. Last person to bid 5 xmr is out if you bid 5.1 xmr on 1 coin
